scripts.build: vite build && npm run copy-anitomy && npm run copy-fkn-media-player && npm run package-build
scripts.package-build: shx rm build/package.asar & npx asar pack build tmp/package.asar && shx mv tmp/package.asar build/package.asar
scripts.copy-fkn-media-player: copyfiles -u 3 ./node_modules/fkn-media-player/build/* build/tmp && shx rm build/tmp/index.js && shx mv build/tmp/* build && shx rm -rf build/tmp

_scripts.copy-fkn-media-player: copyfiles -u 3 ./node_modules/fkn-media-player/build/* build/tmp && shx rm build/tmp/index.js && shx mv build/tmp/* build && shx rm -rf build/tmp
_scripts.copy-fkn-media-player-deps: npm run copy-fkn-media-player-subtitles-octopus && npm run copy-fkn-media-player-worker
_scripts.dev2: concurrently "npm run bundle" "npm run manifest" "npm run readme"
_scripts.readme: nodemon --watch .\readme.json --exec "npm run copy-readme & npm run copy-readme-windows"
_scripts.copy-manifest: cp src/manifest.json dist/manifest.json && cp src/manifest.json release/manifest.json
_scripts.copy-manifest-windows: copy src\manifest.json dist\manifest.json && copy src\manifest.json release\manifest.json
_scripts.copy-images: cp src/images/logo.jpg dist/logo.jpg && cp src/images/logo.jpg release/logo.jpg
_scripts.copy-images-windows: copy src\images\logo.jpg dist\logo.jpg && copy src\images\logo.jpg release\logo.jpg
_scripts.package-asar: Del /F /Q ".\dist\package.asar" & npx asar pack dist tmp/package.asar && move "tmp\package.asar" "dist\package.asar"
_scripts.build: npm run copy-anitomy && npm run copy-fkn-media-player && npm run copy-seal && npm run build-index && npx copyfiles -f ./src/manifest.json ./dist && npm run package-asar && npm run type-check
_scripts.build-bypass-ts: npm run copy-fkn-media-player && npm run build-index && npx copyfiles -f ./src/manifest.json ./dist && npm run package-asar
_scripts.watch: concurrently "npm run serve" "npm run copy-anitomy" "npm run copy-fkn-media-player" "npm run copy-seal" "npm run manifest-watch" "npm run build-index-watch" "npm run package-watch"
_scripts._watch: concurrently "npm run copy-anitomy" "npm run copy-fkn-media-player" "npm run copy-seal" "npm run manifest-watch" "npm run build-index-watch" "npm run type-check-watch" "npm run package-watch"
